overview: It’s off to ballet school – with a difference! – where a fine collection of the hottest, horniest dancers are limbering up for the performance of a lifetime ... all in front of the camera, with their hard cocks out and their hungry mouths and asses ready for action! In fact, dancing never really cums into what goes on at this academy. Instead, these boys parade themselves for your entertainment in the clear hope of raw, unbridled fornication, which (lucky for them – and you!) is very much the only show in town. Billy Elliot, eat your feckin’ heart out!
title: Ballerino
